commentaries.commentary: Puskás Award! Sweden leads England 3-2. Joe Hart clears. Zlatan Ibrahimović is there!
UNBELIEVABLE! Zlatan with an acrobatic overhead kick! GOAL! Sensational!
Zlatan celebrates! Sweden lead 4-2! An unforgettable strike!
First replay: The athleticism, the perfect technique! What a hit!
From this angle: it sails over Joe Hart!
OH MY WORD! Zlatan Ibrahimović! What an audacious bicycle kick! From outside the box, over Gary Cahill and the keeper! It's in! Replays confirm this spectacular goal! Pure magic!
The replay shows it again! Zlatan Ibrahimović's incredible athleticism! And look, pure joy on his face! What a celebration for such a phenomenal goal!

Relive the magic! Zlatan Ibrahimović, pure emotion! From arms outstretched to shirt over his head, an ecstatic roar. Then P. Wilson with a heartfelt gesture, and teammates embracing in collective joy. What celebrations!
